𒊨 uguₓDUL 𒌋𒅗𒇺 ugu-dili₂ "temple" upper part of the skull or scalp

𒊨 uguₓ 𒀀𒅗 ugu₂ 𒀀𒊕 ugu₃ 𒌋𒊕 uguₓ 𒀀𒌋𒅗 uguₓ 𒌋𒅗 ugu against on, over, above 𓂋 more than 𓁷 𓁶 top

𒊨 uguₓ 𒀀𒅗 ugu₂ 𒀀𒊕 ugu₃ 𒌋𒊕 uguₓ 𒀀𒌋𒅗 uguₓ 𒌋𒅗 ugu 𓁷 𓁶 skull, pate, capital, head(er)

𒀭𒊨 an-dul₃ 𒀭𒊕 an-dul₇ ˢandul shade schat.en #şulūlu sun-shade 𒄑𒀭𒊨 ĝeš-an-dul₃ ĝešandul tree shade shandul <> sun shade shade <> 𒋗𒊨 šu-dul₃ šudul •secure protection <> 𒊨 𒋦 𒈰 sumur tēctum Dach <> 𒊮𒊨𒅇 šag₄kuš₂u₃ šag kušu soothe, counsel "to soothe to take counsel with" #malāku @ malik
